lines: 1. Nda' Omonene Yehova,'Moeti bwens' ey' embe,Nd' omworo, Ay' Omonguru,mbwate as'okoboko,
2. Tubora Ensok' engiya,'Sok'Amach' okogwenia,Tiga rire ri'omorero,Rinda' as'orogendo,
Omoboria Omonguru,Obe chinguru chiane, (nyigote)Obe eng'aya yane.
3. Ngoik' engegu ya Yordani,Osiri' obwoba bwane,Ong'etie as'omorindo,Ng'ike ng'umbu Kanaani;
